Summary: Red, Green, Yellow flashing lights from one object. Would condense to one light then spred out.
divs: sighting detailsthis event is on going and it looks like a cross section of an orange when it gets bright. it then gets smaller and will look like three separate lights. then it would come togetether and look like a spreading light of different colors. i was notified by a relative since they saw it in the direction of where i live. when i began looking at it with binoculars and moved to a spotting scope. the object changed shape and color. i am typing this while it is going on and don't have an exact duration yet. i began watching at 20:45. regards, *(wit's name deleted--cms\sg).
